reviews.review:
A nicely paced, and memorable fps classic, game with a few other odd gamemodes.
Sadly there is a rather large influx of hackers in the game as of now.

My favorite Counter Strike and probably one of my top favorite for fps game. Also you basically need this if you want to play Trouble in Terrorist Town on Garry's Mod (another one of my fav games). So I would recommend buying the CSS + GMod pack.

+ Интерес.
+ Красивый Интерфейс.
+ Удобная игра.
+ Возможности

- Не могу оторваться.
Great gameplay, with a large modding community and plenty of available servers. Highly recommend this fast-paced FPS!

Counter Strike Source is very competetive and I like how well it uses the source engine very smooth gameplay fast paced action like you can get in the game play few rounds before leaving to do your work later on the reason I bought this was because of Garry's mod but the game itself is fun with achivements after all some people are achivement hunters and some like to have fun this game will test your skils in competetive teamwork CS GO was not that good I tried it on xbox and ps3 and I hated how it tried to copy CSS on the plus side you get this you can jump in this game to see how good you are go ahead but it would be the wisest choice to own this game
Great game, realistic game play, a first person online shoot em up that will probably never die.
10/10 would buy if it would finally reduce price
Geiles Spiel, ein muss für jeden Zocker!
awesome game fun as hell makes cod search look lame
Counter-Strike will always be better than Call of Duty.
Good aim. Much headsot. This is the very biggest.

Before CoD, there was CS. The original, fast paced, run and gun, spray and pray simulator. And you already know its awesome because you still play it more than 10 years after initial release. Will this game ever die? *BOOM!! HEADSHOTT!!!!!*
Det är ju kul å spela
You can't go wrong with this game. After all these years It's undoubtedly the best game out there.

Это CS:S Даже добавить нечего. Все знают про эту великолепную игру.
Всем советую!

leuke game. niet mooi gemaakt maar gwn leuk om te spelen. 
voor de graphics 6

Aunque a veces te aburre y sea lo mismo es un gran juego, lo recomiendo <3
9/10

This game is a fun shooter game. It is very popular on the steam store. Almost every steam member has this game. I recommend this game.
Хорошая графика. Так же отличное управление.
All time classic for my childhood
a bit much for this but worth the price

Counter Stirke: Source is a game where you have two(2) sides, Counter Terrorist and Terrorist. If you are on the Counter Terrorist side you can defend the bomb site and or hostages. If you are the terrorist you will have to plant the bomb and kill the Counter Terrorist. There is also custom gamemodes such as Zombie:Escape, Deathrun, Bunny hop, and Minigames plus much much more. If you are looking for a skilled shooter game this is the game.
Super fun game and really cheap would highly recomend it!!
Thi si one of the best shooter games I have ever played!
Geilstes spiel auf erden, ich empfehle es jedem Shouter typ! :D
Отличная игра,очень много интересных и разнообразных режимов,особенно Zombie Escape[ze] хороший,рекомедую)
